change.item: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Libraries::Dept. of Special Collections::Manuscripts Division//TEXT (US::CSt::M0303::Thomas Seller Papers )//EN" "m0303.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Thomas Seller Papers , 1948-1978
titlepage.publisher:
Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 The Board of Trustees of Stanford University. All rights reserved.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Thomas Seller Papers , M0303, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: American screenwriter for motion pictures and television.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scripts, screenplays, typescripts of 2 novels, correspondence, notes, publicity and photo albums, programs and journals.
